stages.description: Luke lives on Tatooine with his aunt and uncle.
He discovers a message from Princess Leia.
Initially resists leaving to help Obi-Wan.
Obi-Wan Kenobi guides him.
Leaves Tatooine after his family is killed.
Meets Han Solo, battles the Empire.
Plans the attack on the Death Star.
The trench run on the Death Star.
Destroys the Death Star.
Returns to the Rebel base.
Ceremony honoring his heroism.
Becomes a hero of the Rebellion.
Lives a comfortable life in the Shire.
Gandalf invites him on a quest.
Hesitates to leave his home.
Gandalf encourages him.
Joins the dwarves on their journey.
Encounters trolls, goblins, Gollum.
Reaches the Lonely Mountain.
Faces Smaug, the dragon.
Gains courage and the Arkenstone.
Returns home after the Battle of Five Armies.
Recognized as a hero by his community.
Brings back treasure and a new perspective.

examples.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

stages.description: Lives with his neglectful aunt and uncle.
Learns he is a wizard.
Initially doubts he can be a wizard.
Hagrid guides him into the wizarding world.
Attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
Makes friends, learns magic, faces challenges.
Investigates the mystery of the Sorcerer's Stone.
Confronts Professor Quirrell/Voldemort.
Protects the Sorcerer's Stone.
Recovers in the hospital wing.
Wins House Cup for Gryffindor.
Returns to the Dursleys with newfound confidence.
Lives as the prince of the Pride Lands.
Witnesses his father's death.
Runs away from the Pride Lands.
Meets Timon and Pumbaa.
Adopts a carefree life in the jungle.
Grows up away from home.
Encounters Nala and is urged to return.
Confronts Scar to reclaim his throne.
Defeats Scar and takes his place as king.
Restores the Pride Lands.
Embraces his role as leader.
Brings peace and prosperity back to his kingdom.
